about_the_game:
"Jinni: Haunted House" is a horror experience designed to lure brave players deep into the spirit world. In this dark and haunted atmosphere, you will experience moments of fear and suspense as you escape from the shadow of a mysterious creature stalking you.

Atmosphere: Get ready for a true horror experience with the game's stunning sound design and impressive soundtrack. You'll get lost in the chimes of the call to prayer and the whispers of the jinn.

Mysterious Storyline: An in-depth horror story will draw players into mysterious events as your character's past and the secrets of this dark house are revealed.

Horror Houses and Labyrinths: Designed to complicate your escape, the houses of horror and labyrinths will give you a constant sense of tension and danger.

Constant Danger: As a player haunted by a constant stalker, you must be on your guard at all times. As the shadow approaches you, your breath will be taken away and your heartbeat will speed up.

content_descriptors.notes: Our game contains horror elements. It also contains horror sounds, horror themes and jumpscare elements. There is no sexual content, forced sex, drugs, alcohol or self-harm.

name: Jinni : Haunted House

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Windows 7/8/10 (64 bits)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760/AMD Radeon HD 7970
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8700 (3.20GHz)/AMD Ryzen 7 2700 (3.20GHz)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 980/AMD Radeon R9 390X
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: Can you escape this haunted house? Or will you become a hostage of the mysterious creatures? It's up to you! Find your way out of the haunted house and save your life!
